abstract: The Detroit Lions are in the spotlight again, with Ndamukong Suh and Cliff Avril accused of taunting Falcons quarterback Matt Ryan while he was down.
snippet: The Detroit Lions are in the spotlight again, with Ndamukong Suh and Cliff Avril accused of taunting Falcons quarterback Matt Ryan while he was down.

headline.main: Lions' Dream Season Suddenly Less Dreamy
